file_content.text: Ack... Captain, sir! They're everywhere, sir--they're all over us! You have to warn Sergeant Yuun!
The enemy is neutralized, Corporal.
It's safe now.
Neutralized... enemy. Good. Good.
Just take it easy and start from the beginning.
Slow down, Corporal.
I want facts, not gibberish, soldier!
Pull yourself together!
I'll try to ease his pain, sir. But I'm afraid there's nothing else I can do for him.
It was pirates. Grimy, murdering pirates!
They... they knew what we were after. Their leader grabbed the... grabbed the Umbra part and ran!
Do you know where the pirates are based? Who their leader is?
Can you tell me anything else?
All I heard them say was that they needed the Umbra parts.
First the Empire, now pirates? Fantastic.
This is bad.
Don't... don't let them stop us, sir! We have to finish it!
How could they know about the Umbra? Who told them?
Impossible!
I don't know, sir. I don't know.
Please, sir! You have to warn Sergeant Yuun--the pirates will be gunning for him next!
Yuun needs to know what's heading his way.
I'll contact him immediately.
Yuun can probably handle himself, but I'd better give him a heads-up.
Can't hurt to warn him.
An enemy who thinks he's winning will be easier for us to kill. Yuun can't be warned.
No. Warning Yuun isn't smart.
A cunning strategy, sir. The enemy won't realize they're walking into a trap.
Captain! We are required to take all possible measures to warn allies of impending attack!
Those are fellow soldiers out there, Captain! We can't just let them walk straight into a trap!
Cold move, sir. Clever, too--but it might get our new freak killed.
Please, sir... please. Don't. Don't let them die out there. Please.
I can't betray my fellow soldiers.
You're right.
Sergeant Yuun, come in. Sajin's team was ambushed by pirates. The Umbra component was stolen. More pirates are headed for your position, over.
Yuun acknowledges. Precautions will be taken. What is the condition of Sajin's team?
Two men were dead on arrival, and Sajin won't survive his wounds.
All men KIA.
Sajin is the only one left--but he won't make it. You have my sympathies.
I'm sorry--it's bad.
Yuun... appreciates your concern, sir. Those lost will be remembered for their heroism.
Sajin will be kicking off any second now. The others already bought it.
The team was slaughtered.
Yuun... acknowledges.
Please--tell Sajin that he and his fellows have served with honor. Yuun must see to defensive measures. Please hurry to us, sir.
Thank you, sir. I had to be sure. Had to warn him.
Yuun wanted you to know that you served with honor, Sajin.
You've done well, Corporal.
Thank you... thank you....
I will avenge you.
Good, sir. Make them pay... make them pay....
Tough break, Corporal. It was nice knowing you.
Time to move out.
Good--goodbye, Captain.
Risks have to be taken in the line of duty.
Sorry, but I can't warn Yuun.
No, sir... please, no....
This is for the best, Corporal.
I know what I'm doing.
He has to know... has to know....
